mapper.select: SELECT * FROM todo_items LEFT JOIN users ON users.id = todo_items.user_id WHERE todo_items.is_deleted = 0 ORDER BY expire_date ASC;

SELECT * FROM todo_items t LEFT JOIN users u ON u.id = t.user_id WHERE t.is_deleted = 0 AND (t.item_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWords}, '%') OR u.family_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWords}, '%') OR u.first_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchWords}, '%')) ORDER BY t.expire_date ASC;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO todo_items (user_id, item_name, registration_date, expire_date, finished_date) VALUES (#{userId}, #{itemName}, CURRENT_DATE, #{expireDate}, #{finishedDate});
mapper.update: UPDATE todo_items SET user_id = #{userId}, item_name = #{itemName}, expire_date = #{expireDate}, finished_date = #{finishedDate}, is_finished = #{isFinished} WHERE id = #{id};
